summary: Kennedy Blaine, a Californian girl, inherits a ranch in the small town of Valentine in Nebraska. Before she sells the property, she decides to spend the summer in her house and learn more about her family.
cast: Michaela McManus|Diogo Morgado|Hunter Cross|James Kisicki|John Eby|Danny Rios|Brian Bartels|Maryanne Nagel|Keith Benford|Lindsay Wagner|Edward Asner|Kaitlyn Sapp|Jonathan Yurco|Annie Kitral|Kellen Boyle|Charlene Campanella|Cora Higgins|Pamela Mann|McKenna Stoffer|Brandon Tylka|Rod Fielder|Kevin Fox|Kristie Galloway|Gabrielle McAndrew|Doug Meacham|Sue Danna Myer|Melissa Santiago|Debbie Scaletta|Jeff Seich
title: Encuentra el amor en Valentine
